title: Publish a local release (canary or stable) to NPM
body:
#### Issue #14201. Builds on top of #14255 ([view the delta](https://github.com/bvaughn/react/compare/automated-release-scripts-part-3...bvaughn:automated-release-scripts-part-4?expand=1)).

This PR adds the final `publish` script and does a bit of cleanup of the pre-existing scripts. (For example, the `build` script is no longer needed and so it has been removed.)

This PR also removes the pre-build "version-check" behavior since there is an expected version mismatch between canary packages and the embedded React version (used by DevTools). If this change is controversial, I'm happy to elaborate on why I chose this detail and discuss alternatives.

**[Learn more about these new release scripts here.](https://github.com/bvaughn/react/blob/automated-release-scripts-part-4/scripts/release/README.md#react-release-scripts)**

## Demos

### Checking out a Circle CI build for a canary release
![prepare-canary](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29597/48728426-c502c300-ebe9-11e8-8756-5b58064494cd.gif)

### Preparing a canary release to be promoted to stable
![prepare-stable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29597/48728440-cdf39480-ebe9-11e8-91fa-3f0e482bb09c.gif)

### Publishing a release
![publish-canary](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29597/48728460-d8ae2980-ebe9-11e8-87d4-ce91e9ebd420.gif)

### Resuming an interrupted publish (dry run)
![publish-resume](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29597/48728471-e4015500-ebe9-11e8-9809-eb8643d76fcf.gif)

### Creating a local canary (escape hatch)
Note that I trimmed the middle out of this GIF since building takes a long time.
![create-canary-output](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29597/48728536-0dba7c00-ebea-11e8-886b-1c923dc375e5.gif)
